content: अनुपद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पदान्यनुगतः] {@--1@} Following the feet closely. {@--2@} Following every word; °सूत्रं a commentary (of a Brāhmaṇa) explaining the text word for word. --दः <ab>N.</ab> of a man or tribe. --दं A chorus, burden of a song or words sung again at regular intervals. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} [ पदानां पश्चात्] {@--1@} Along the feet, near the feet; अनुपदं बद्धा अनुपदीना <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} Step by step, at every step; <ls>Śi. 9. 78.</ls> {@--3@} Word for word. {@--4@} On the heels of, close behind or after, immediately after (of time or space); अनुपदमन्वेष्टा अनुपदी <ls>Sk.</ls>; गच्छतां पुरो भवंतौ . अहमप्यनुपदमागत एव <ls>Ś. 3</ls> I shall be close behind you, just follow you; °दमुच्चलित एव <ls>K. 263</ls>, <ls n="K.">264</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with <ab>gen.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab> in this sense; लक्ष्मीवाननुपदमस्य संप्रतस्थे <ls>Ki. 12. 54</ls>; (तौ) आशिषामनुपदं समस्पृशत् पाणिना <ls>R. 11. 31</ls>; अमोघाः प्रतिगृह्णंतावर्ध्यानुपदमाशिषः <ls n="R.">1. 44</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 81</ls>; <ls>Śi. 14. 48.</ls>
